input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Liking spicy food has a direct effect on room. The candle has a direct effect on room. The overall probability of liking spicy food is 54%. The probability of not liking spicy food and dark room is 16%. The probability of liking spicy food and dark room is 36%. Is the chance of dark room smaller when observing liking spicy food?
